attributes.action: We Brits want the Red Arrow to represent 2012 Olympics, Stop worrying about everyone else, we're BRITISH afterall.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
THINK BRITISH, RED ARROWS - BRITISH.
BRITAIN IS REPRESENTING THE 2012 OLYMPICS - THINK BRITISH!!!
LETS GET MORE PATRIOTIC.  PUT THE GREAT BACK INTO BRITAIN.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
